name: io.bytes.per.checksum
description:
The number of bytes per checksum.  Must not be larger than
  io.file.buffer.size.

name: dfs.client.failover.connection.retries.on.timeouts
description:
Expert only. The number of retry attempts a failover IPC client
    will make on socket timeout when establishing a server connection.

name: dfs.client.retry.times.get-last-block-length
description: Number of retries for calls to fetchLocatedBlocksAndGetLastBlockLength().

name: dfs.balancer.getBlocks.min-block-size
description:
Minimum block threshold size in bytes to ignore when fetching a source's
    block list.

name: mapreduce.task.timeout
description:
The number of milliseconds before a task will be
  terminated if it neither reads an input, writes an output, nor
  updates its status string.  A value of 0 disables the timeout.

name: dfs.domain.socket.disable.interval.seconds
description:
The interval that a DataNode is disabled for future Short-Circuit Reads,
    after an error happens during a Short-Circuit Read. Setting this to 0 will
    not disable Short-Circuit Reads at all after errors happen. Negative values
    are invalid.

name: dfs.namenode.retrycache.expirytime.millis
description: The time for which retry cache entries are retained.
